name: Lab Escape (itch) (Luis D. Xebec)
description:
This project was develop by Luis Delgadillo as a final project for the UETC Unreal Engine course.

This is a survivor horror game, in the style of the resident evil shoulder view. You have to escape from a laboratory that is infested with zombies in order to win this game.

The game was made in Unreal Engine 5 and you can play it on windows.

You can download the game from this google drive folder.

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/18CYYJYoLAtEeG-qeKhLV25zZs_KY1j64?usp=sha...
